roleset.name: a short, shrill little cry or sound, as that of a baby bird
roleset.note: PEEP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'peep' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38. (from peep.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Baby Bird
example.text: The baby bird peeped for its mother's return.

roleset.name: to look slyly, pryingly, or furtively
roleset.note: PEEP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'peep' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38. (from peep.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: Hide-and-go-seek
example.text: Mary peeped around the corner at John.
